shows.title: Crazy Comic Club
shows.desc: Welcome to a journey into the amazing world of comic art - learn secrets of character creation, free your creativity and express yourself in new and wondrous ways, discover tips used by the professionals, and hone the skills required to bring your imagination to life in cartoon form! May include manga magic, papercraft and pop-ups - All you need to bring is your imagination!
